ygData.subject: Re: Effects of DEX/WIS
ygData.msgSnippet: It is my understanding the a high Intel. will help you increase your skill faster while a high wisdom will help you fail less often. That is how it is for
ygData.messageBody:
It is my understanding the a high Intel. will help you increase your skill
faster while a high wisdom will help you fail less often. That is how it is
for Smithing anyway.
----- Original Message -----
From: <UTAMAN23@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 5:45 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Effects of DEX/WIS


> Anyone else heard that DEX is the # 1 roll check for skill successes?
> Reading eq.castersrealm.com check the necro creation guide, and it states
> this. Anyone try anything with DEX? I have a jeweling paladin and can
get
> his WIS up to 162/171 with gear and over 180 with buffs. Havent tried DEX
> although later tonight I intend on trying with a Shaman DEX buff to see if
I
> find a difference.
> Let me know what yall think
> Maledicta Soulstealer 47 necro gnome
> Bertox
